content.heading: Basic info
content.text: Name: ≈Åukasz Plac; Born: 1983; Place of birth: Skwierzyna; School: Wroclaw Univeristy of Technology; Interests: Web Design, Javascript, Computer Science, Music

content.heading: More info
content.text: I am really happy to live in this world where dreams and ideas can come true. Only thing you need is to be open-minded. Then you achieve everything you want.; My latest dream is to become a Web Developer; I finished recently Kodilla Bootcam where I learned many usefull stuff related to Web Development; I don`t want to stop developing myself so the question who I'm going to be is still open; Besides coding, you can meet me mostly snowboarding or playing tennis. Recently I love a little instrument called harmonica that has great acoustic colour, especially when playing blues music.
